text: Old bill or Old Bill may refer to: * Slang for a police officer or for law enforcement in the United Kingdom * Old Bill (comics), a cartoon character created in 1914–15 by Bruce Bairnsfather ** The Better 'Ole or The Romance of Old Bill, 1917 stage musical comedy based on the cartoon character ** The Romance of Old Bill, 1918 British silent film based on the play * Old Bill Williams (1787-1849), American mountain man and frontiersman ==See also== * * Poor Old Bill, 1931 British comedy film
title: Old bill
